p.s: Description of Nocardia ignorata sp. nov.

Nocardia ignorata (ig.no.ra'ta. L. fem. part. adj. ignorata unrecognized, unknown, pertaining to the fact that the type strain was mistakenly used as a member of the genus Mycobacterium in a mycobacterial quality control test)
Hyphae are Gram-positive and slightly acid-alcoholfast.
The orange-coloured vegetative hyphae are well-developed with irregular branches penetrating the agar and bear white aerial hyphae.
At a late stage of growth, the hyphae fragment into rod-shaped elements.
Contains meso-diaminopimelic acid, galactose and arabinose in whole-cell hydrolysates (i.e. cell wall chemotype IV).

Has mycolic acids with 46-54 carbon atoms and 0-3 double bonds (C46:2, C48:0, C48:2, C49:0, C49:1, C50:0, C50:1, C50:3, C51:0, C51:1, C52:0, C52:1, C53:1, C54:0, C54:1, C55:1, C56:1 and C57:1 that are cleaved on pyrolysis to release fatty acids of C14:0, C16:0, C18:1 and C18:0, with C16:0 as the major cleavage product.
The cellular fatty acid profile is composed of saturated, unsaturated and 10-methyl branched fatty acids.
Possesses type PII phospholipids with significant amounts of phosphatidylethanolamine.

The menaquinone system consists of partially saturated menaquinones with eight isoprene units in which the two terminal isoprene moieties are cyclized; MK-8(H6) is the major menaquinone and minor amounts of 2,3-epoxy-MK-8(H6) are also present.
Hydrolyses aesculin, gelatin, testosterone and urea but not adenine, casein, elastin, guanine, hypoxanthine, keratin, tyrosine or xanthine.

Assimilates acetate, gluconate, glucose, maltose, mannitol, sucrose, trehalose and paraffin as carbon sources but not adipate, isoamyl alcohol, benzoate, citrate, lactate, arabinose, cellobiose, galactose, lactose, melezitose, raffinose, rhamnose, xylose, adonitol, meso-erythritol, myo-inositol, sorbitol, 2,3-butanediol, 1,2- propanediol, m-hydroxybenzoate or p-hydroxybenzoate.
Utilizes gelatin and proline but not acetamide, alanine or serine as simultaneous carbon and nitrogen sources.
The G­C content of the DNA is 68.08 mol%.
The type strain is strain IMMIB R-1434T (=DSM 44496T=NRRL B-24141T).
